headline.main: NEW UNIT TO STUDY RADIO PROPAGANDA; Listening Post in London to Help U.S. Gather Data on Foreign Broadcasts BBC FACILITIES TO BE USED Project Disclosed as Director of FCC Monitoring Agency Departs on Clipper

lead_paragraph: A new listening post through which the government will check on European radio propaganda soon will be set up in London, supplementing those which have been operating: here, Lloyd A. Free, director of the foreign broadcast monitoring service of the Federal Communications Commission, disclosed yesterday.
